### Solicitation for Line Stripping and Painting Services
#### Parcs Canada (Parks Canada Agency)

The [Parks Canada Agency](https://www.pc.gc.ca/fr) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for Line Stripping and Painting Services at various national parks in Alberta and British Columbia. The contract will include painting roadway lines and hatch marking of roadway islands on primary highways, secondary highways, local roads, and town sites located in Banff and Jasper National Parks in Alberta, and Yoho, Kootenay, Glacier, Mt. Revelstoke National Parks in British Columbia.

**Contract Information**

* Reference Number: cb-4186-43768982
* Solicitation Number: 5P420-22-0280/A
* Publication Date: March 13, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time: April 18, 2023, 16:00:00 (Mountain Daylight Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

**Bidding Guidelines**

In-person bids and bids sent by courier will not be accepted. Only electronic bids via email will be accepted. The email address for submissions is [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto:soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca). The fax number for submissions is 1-866-246-6893. The maximum email file size that can be received is 15 megabytes. Bidders are responsible for any issues related to file size.

**Technical Requirements**

* Painting of roadway lines on primary highways, secondary highways, local roads, and town sites
* Hatch marking of roadway islands on primary highways, secondary highways, local roads, and town sites
* Compliance with the National Parks Act and its regulations

**Timeline**

The contractor must complete the Work no later than October 31, 2023.
